verbs.description: < p > Ever since [ARG1: President Trump] [V: came] [ARG4: into office] , investors thought they had the script figured out . The promise of deregulation , tax cuts , and fiscal stimulus would push the economy ’s pedal to the metal , while Trump ’s tough populist talk — and threats of new tariffs — would steer focus back onto U.S. stocks.</p >
